remarks: Square root distributes over multiplication.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2016.)
statement:
resqrcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
resqrcld.2 $e |- ( ph -> 0 <_ A ) $.
sqr11d.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
sqr11d.4 $e |- ( ph -> 0 <_ B ) $.
sqrtmuld $p |- ( ph -> ( sqrt ` ( A x. B ) ) = ( ( sqrt ` A ) x. ( sqrt ` B ) ) ) $.
